name: Miami Racing: Furious Muscle Cars And Speed On Asphalt 2
name_original: Miami Racing: Furious Muscle Cars And Speed On Asphalt 2
description:
Miami Racing FULL GAME, all cars and tracks, without In-App purchases or ads.

With golden era muscle cars, tear through the streets of 80's Miami after the sun sets. Each level brings back the fun nostalgia of 1980's Miami, leaving you wanting to repeat levels to see the detail in the game. With each race, you unlock new cars and modifications to collect.
Well balanced car physics, focused on fun, provides the right amount of realism mixed with arcade flair to keep you locked in playing.

No In-App Purchases.
No internet required.
Just a good time racing the streets of Miami.

Available on:
* iPad 2 and above
* iPad Mini and above
* iPhone 4S and above
* iPod Touch 5 and above.

Butterflyware is a small independent video game development studio based in the Czech Republic.
Mainly focused on fair mobile gaming without In-App Purchases.
